channel.title: Educations on Mohammed Noman
channel.description: Recent content in Educations on Mohammed Noman

item.title: PhD in Artificial Intelligence
item.description: Started PhD in Artificial Intelligence at University of East London. My research is focused on Compound Flood Risk Modelling using AI Relevant Modules: ML using PySpark, Cloud Computing, Big Data using Hadoop & Spark, Information Security.

item.title: MSc Big Data Technologies
item.description: Achieved Distinction in Masters of Science: Big Data Technologies from University of East London. Relevant Modules: ML using PySpark, Cloud Computing, Big Data using Hadoop & Spark, Information Security.

item.title: Bachelors in Computer Science Engineering
item.description: Achieved Distinction in Bachelor of Technology: Computer Science Engineering from Dr Babasaheb Ambedkar Technological University, India. Relevant Modules: Python, R, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Mathematics, Data Structures, IT Laws.
